ModMetaData.name: No Hairless Royal Headgear (aka "Eltex Circlets")
ModMetaData.author: Oh God Spiders No
ModMetaData.description: Coronets, Crowns, and Eltex Skullcaps -- now called "Eltex Circlets" -- no longer hide pawns' hair. Eltex Skullcaps are replaced by Eltex Circlets, which are identical other than their name and a slightly different graphic.
